lines.text: We don't know anything about this creature other than it, like everyone else, hates a mouth full of shaving cream.
That ought to stop it for now. No one likes a mouth full of shaving cream.
Are you okay?
My head.
I don't think you broke your head.
You really think there's something out there trying to kill us?
[Something inside the house breaks]
No, now it may be inside.
Where's Jim?
He's melting in the other room.
If we can confuse the creature enough to beat the crap out of itself we could get close enough to axe it.
This feels like mud.
It is mud. Dirt and water make mud. You learn something new every day.
This asshole comes down here looking like Friday the 13th trying to scare us!
[Stacy is vulnerable to an attack from the creature]
Is someone paying you to stand by an open window? There are some razor blades in the corner you can play with if you like.
Name a horror movie - ANY horror movie.
Oh great, it controls minds, it eats people, it reproduces!
This part reminds me of 'Invasion of the Body Snatchers.'
How did they kill them?
They didn't.
Really, Mike, it's logically stupid for you to be worried by this.
I don't exactly call a disappearing raw chicken a murder attempt.
He IS a horror film - a walking, talking horror film!
